title: Help a silver derp out
body: Just wondering if anyone plat+ could spectate me for one game tonight and tell me some pointers on what I could do better, what I'm doing wrong, better decision choices, etc. it's only taken me since season 2 to realise... IM TERRIBLE. Really want to improve, leave a reply of your summoner name if you can help and I'll add you :D or add me :p yes this is a smurf but it's my main now
